entities.description: The use of substances such as tobacco, alcohol, and drugs among individuals.
Conditions related to mental health such as depression, anxiety, etc.
Details about the receipt of substance use or mental health treatment.
Demographic details of the survey respondents, such as age, gender, and socioeconomic status.
Areas defined by lower population density and limited access to large urban centers.
Availability of facilities and services such as healthcare, education, and transportation.
The financial status of individuals or households, often categorized by income levels.
Details about the educational attainment of individuals.
Legal regulations and policies related to substance use and mental health.

relationships.description: Indicates an individual's use of substances such as tobacco, alcohol, or drugs.
Indicates an individual experiencing a mental health issue.
Indicates that the individual has received some form of treatment for substance use or mental health issues.
Relates an individual to their demographic information such as age, gender, and socioeconomic status.
Indicates that the individual resides in a rural area.
Describes the availability of infrastructure in a rural area.
Describes the economic status of an individual or household.
Details the education level attained by an individual.
Indicates that an individual is affected by specific laws or regulations related to substance use and mental health.
